alert.note: Alert for Sheep Range; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 30 at 3:53AM PST until January 30 at 7:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PST THIS EVENING ABOVE 5000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 3500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches above 5000 feet, with lighter amounts below. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Sheep Range and Spring Mountains. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 7 PM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Sheep Range; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon
